hero.headline: Shop Social for Best Prices
hero.description: Shop and save online with friends, ${Kip} gets you the lowest prices when you shop together.${br}Use Kip today!

services.tagDescrip: ${Kip} beats traditional web shopping by bringing all types of products into one place.

descrips: Forgot password? Kip lets you shop across multiple stores with 1-login.
Save on shipping and split Amazon Prime fees without sharing passwords.
Create group orders through Slack, Email, and Facebook Messenger.

compare.subHead: Just check out how we compare.

images.bubble: Browse Items or Paste a URL to Add Things to Your Kip Cart
Use Kip to Store the Items you Love in the Cloud
Invite friends to Add to Your Kip Cart, Share Shipping and Other Fees

faq.title: How do I use kip?
faq.answer:
Start using Kip by clicking New Cart and enter your email address to login
Select your favorite store and add items to Kip cart using search or copy - paste URL.
Check out the tutorial on How It Works page

faq.title: Why can‚Äôt I remove items from my cart?
faq.answer: Only Team Admins can add and remove other people‚Äôs items in the cart, change quantities and set budgets and prices. Team members can remove only their own items.

faq.title: I don‚Äôt see the my team name in the authorization page.
faq.answer: You may need additional admin privileges to add Kipbot to your team or channel. Check your admin levels by clicking your account profile on your Slack team.

faq.title: I don‚Äôt use any platform but I want to try it.
faq.answer: We have a no frills, no download, no sign-in version available at kipthis.com/chat. If you have a chat service you want Kip to be on, drop us a note.

faq.title: I can‚Äôt get Kip to work:(
faq.answer: If Kip isn‚Äôt working for you, drop us a message and we‚Äôll get back to you ASAP.

faq.title: Who is Kip?
faq.answer: Kip is a young digital penguin who is loves large groups of people. Being inside teams is like being in a community colony:). They are 5"inches tall, very blue and hate missing a good sale. Their favorite food is emoji üçã üçâ üçá if you send Kip emojis, they will get happy! Underneath their round black eyes, they have a personality like an iceberg‚Ä¶

why.head: WHY PENGUINS?
why.description: ${Kip} brings a penguin's perspective to collective purchasing.
reasons: Group together to share resources and warmth.
Help each other find the best spots to shop and fish.
Swim through deals like a professional Penguin.
